DOC.brief_title: Maxillary Sinus Irrigation Management Chronic Rhinosinusitis
DOC.detailed_description: Effectiveness maxillary sinus saline irrigation conjunction systemic antibiotic therapy versus systemic antibiotic therapy alone management chronic rhinosinusitis . A prospective randomized control trial conduct Carmel Medical Center , Haifa , Israel . Patients randomize one two arm . One arm receive sinus irrigation saline conjunction IV antibiotic , control arm receive regimen IV antibiotic without sinus irrigation . Quality life , CT scan nasal endoscopy parameter collect treatment .
